item.title: Create a bit.ly like shorturl static website
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: I decided to create my own shorturl website last week for personal use and ended up developing a python project (deecubes)that can be used by anyone to do the same. This is a post to explain what/why/how about it. Why my own shorturl website?
